title: Jingle Land
subtitle: The Land of Music and Entertainment
location: Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura
description:
Hello Music Enthusiasts! JINGLE LAND is here!
Experience the electrifying atmosphere of a musical extravaganza as diverse bands unite on one stage. Vibrant melodies fill the air, ranging from soulful ballads to heart-pounding rhythms. Enthusiastic crowds sway in harmony, immersed in the pulsating energy of live performances. Each band will bring its unique flair, captivating audiences with its raw talent and infectious passion.

title: Core Summer Festival Bangalore
subtitle: Coming Soon!
location: Bengaluru
description:
Can’t wait to meet up with magical unicorns, trippy mermaids, and our favorite #fashion, #Culture, and #art lovers this June!! 😀 🌈🌺🌴🦋

Here are the dates for our Summerfest #CORE festival

Tag your lot and make some plans, ‘cos we’ll be circling back here with line + ticket details really soon!! 😊✌🏻🍄

title: Nikhita Gandhi Live In Concert
location: Phoenix Marketcity, Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura
description: Nikhita Gandhi! A versatile Indian playback singer, Nikhita has charmed audiences across five different languages with her soulful voice. From Bollywood blockbusters like "Raabta" and "Jagga Jasoos" to regional hits like "Leo" and "Varisu," her repertoire knows no bounds. Hosted by Noizz Entertainment, this unforgettable event on May 18th at Phoenix Marketcity, Whitefield, Bangalore, promises to be a celebration of music and magic.

title: CrossOver ft. Guy Mantzur
subtitle: Father Of Progressive Techno GUY MANTZUR
location: Passport office, Mantri Avenue, next to Koramangala, KHB Games Village, Koramangala
description: Excitement fills us as we bring the Father Of Progressive Techno GUY MANTZUR to Bangalore, marking its inaugural appearance at Sunburn Union for our CrossOver Edition this May. 🍾

title: SCC SkyCinema - Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 1/2, Old Madras Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Sivanchetti Gardens, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008
description:
"Seize the day, my friend. Pehle is din ko poori tarah jiyo, phir chalis ke bare mein sochna." - Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara

Prepare to embark on a cinematic adventure like never before as Sunset Cinema Club presents the screening of this classic at 1 mg - Lido Mall. Get ready to indulge your senses and immerse yourself in the magic of the silver screen under the open sky.

Enjoy your favourite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of 1 mg- Lido Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: SCC SkyCinema - Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560062
description:
"Kuch kuch hota hai, Anjali, tum nahi samjhogi." - Kuch Kuch Hota Hai

Sunset Cinema Club invites you to join us for a captivating evening as we revisit the iconic romance that has captured hearts for generations. Relive the magic of love, friendship and unforgettable moment at Forum South Bangalore Mall. 

Enjoy your favourite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of Forum South Bangalore Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: A Night of Rock & Pop Anthems
subtitle: Ft Fernandes Band
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Celebrate a night with Pop & Rock hits of the 90`s & 2000`s era performed by FERNANDES.
What better way to spend a night than to unwind and listen to the Pop & Rock hits of the '90s and 2000s era? A tribute to the classic hits that have reinvented the RnB scene is something you wouldn`t want to miss out on. A night filled with groovy tunes and exceptional musicians awaits you.
Grab your tickets to be part of one of the most soulful nights Bengaluru will ever witness!
Be there to experience the chaos and dance to the band`s incredible beats.

title: Sunny Tunes
subtitle: Ft Crimson Waves
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Make some noise and have fun, since the music gets two times better when a DJ lifts his hands in the air.
Every Friday night, starting at 1 p.m., Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru is happy to host Crimson Waves and his incredible sounds for the musically charged Blockbusters.
Prepare to party and enjoy the evening with excellent food, live music, and cool drinks.

title: Karaoke Nights
subtitle: Ft KJ Naveen
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Have you ever let your inner bathroom singer play for the rest of the world?
If not, our Karaoke Nights are the perfect opportunity to let loose and sing like no one is watching with a group of people who care about your passion for singing and want to share it with you.
Bring your friends and family to Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru for an unforgettable Karaoke night.

title: Tribute to Pink Floyd
subtitle: Ft Meduza
location: Unit G 25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall, International Tech Park, Pattandur Agrahara, Whitefield, Bangalore
description:
Home, home again! You`d like to be here while you can!!!!

Hold your breath and start counting down the days before you witness the tribute night, and this time it`s to none other than Pink Floyd!
Pink Floyd was the pioneer of psychedelic music and one of the biggest selling acts ever on the planet. The group acquired a sensational reputation by performing sound & light shows and built a cult following that continues to grow even after years of the bands breaking up.

Join us for an evening full of unforgettable music, and tremendous vibes and catch Meduza playing live hits of PINK FLOYD only at the Hard Rock Cafe, Whitefield, Bengaluru

title: Single's Mixer THE HAPPY HOUR
subtitle: SOCIALISE | EXPLORE | CONNECT
location: Shop No 33, 80 Feet Rd, near Wipro Park, opposite Barista and Domino's, 4th Block, S.T. Bed, Cauvery Colony, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034
description:
Get ready to socialize, mingle, and connect with like-minded, verified individuals at our electrifying event. Whether you're looking for new friends, potential love interests, or simply a great time, this is the place to be!

Break the ice with interactive speed dating and activities designed to help you meet new people in a relaxed environment. Only for singles, legally separated and single parents.                                                                Age - 28 - 38 years

title: Sing for KK: The Mega Tribute Concert
subtitle: Alive India Fundraiser & Awareness Concert
location: 56, Commissariat Rd, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
description:
Why This Concert is Special:
Experience the captivating and electrifying performance delivered by Alive India Rockstars
Sing along to the illustrious repertoire of KKs melodious tunes
Join us for an unforgettable night as celebrity artists unite to celebrate the timeless music of KK!
This isn't just another concert; it's the Alive India Fundraiser & Awareness Concert, aiming to support deserving musicians through the Alive India Music Foundation NGO's MSR (Musicians Social Responsibility) Campaign, "Sing to Save - Changing Lives Through Music" mission. Our goal is to provide musicians with essentials like free food, shelter, upskill training, and sustainable career opportunities.

title: Stereo Express at Sunburn Union
location: passport office, Mantri Avenue, next to Koramangala, KHB Games Village, Koramangala
description: Get ready to embark on a mesmerizing melodic journey as Stereo Express takes the stage at Sunburn Union on 18th May. Renowned as both a producer and DJ, Stereo Express is not just a performer—he's a storyteller on a mission to captivate his audience. With a signature sound that seamlessly blends high energy with smooth melodies, Stereo Express has earned his place among the top 10 Melodic Techno artists worldwide in 2020. His track "REBIRTH" has amassed over 1 million plays on Spotify, showcasing his ability to resonate with listeners on a global scale. In 2022, Stereo Express launched his own label, "OFF WORLD," with the release of his latest track "THE REALM." This visionary move solidifies his status as a pioneer in the electronic music scene.

title: The Wanted - India Tour
location: Sarjapura Road, Next to RGA tech park, Carmelaram, Hadosiddapura, Chikkakannalli
description: The Wanted is a British-Irish boy band formed in 2009 and signed a worldwide contract to Universal Music, Island Records and Mercury Records, and was managed by Scooter Braun. The Wanted's released their debut album, The Wanted in 2010. It peaked at number four on the UK Albums Chart. and spawned three UK top 20 singles: their debut single, "All Time Low", which topped UK Singles Chart, "Heart Vacancy", which reached number two, and "Lose My Mind", which reached number nineteen. Their follow-up album Battleground, was released in 2011 and reached number five in the UK and number four in Ireland. The album lead single, "Gold Forever", was released in aid of Comic Relief and peaked at number three in the UK. The third single, "Lightning", hit number two in the UK.

title: Swarathma India Tour — Powered by the Sun
location: Whitefield Main Rd, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Mahadevpura
description: With the Raushan India Tour, legendary folk-rock band Swarathma (Pyaasi, Kaash, Raushan, Naane Daari, Raah E Fakira) invite you to a celebration of their new album Raushan, with music that’s fun, epic and sustainable. Known for their remarkable storytelling, Swarathma’s 20-year long journey has been marked by innovation and creativity including the live collaborations with AI, massive interactive showcases and cross-cultural music. Building on this blueprint, the iconic folk-rockers are setting out on a nationwide tour to celebrate songs from the new album as well as classic favourites, and ring in many a core memory with you. See you on the Raushan Tour, in your city!

title: Free Earth festival Bangalore Pre-Event
location: AUDITORIUM, THE LALIT ASHOK, 34, Kumara Park East, Seshadripuram
description: One of the Biggest music festival is back to India in Bangalore. It's Free Earth festival Pre-Event happening again after 5years. Be ready for the biggest announcement soon.

title: Aggressive Tendencies: The Gathering
location: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: After 30 successful editions, Aggressive Tendencies is expanding its horizons to Bangalore, presenting one of its most monumental shows yet and unveiling an exciting new event: THE GATHERING. Prepare for the most brutal midweek gathering, showcasing the most intense lineup of the year featuring DEFEATED SANITY, GODLESS, and ANORECTAL ULCERATION. Join us for an unforgettable night of unbridled energy and unparalleled performances. Don't miss out on this epic installment of Aggressive Tendencies as we kick off a new era with The Gathering.
